name: How to Dismantle a Lie in 10 Easy Steps
name_original: How to Dismantle a Lie in 10 Easy Steps
description:
You live in Saintmar.

Your next door country is Dastria.

Dastrians have controlled your country since the Great War, nearly one hundred years ago. They won the war as your country's colonizers, giving you a veil of independence. They control your media, your trade, and all of your freedoms.

The Dastrians are known internationally for their strong opinions, but you know them to be lies. Your country's reputation has been ruined, because to keep you in place, the Dastrians have claimed that during The Great War, your country committed aggressive murders against their people. Even though they were winning the war.

You've had enough of the lies and subjugation. It's time to right the wrongs.

It is recommended you play in fullscreen!
